    • Uses of buyableSquare in boardrelated

      Subclasses of buyableSquare in boardrelated 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  cabSquare
      This class as the sub-type of buyableSquares allows us progress in a manner that the users can buy cab squares and in addition to that build some stands.
      class  deedSquare
      This class as the sub-type of buyableSquares allows us progress in a manner that the users can buy deed squares and in addition to that build some houses, hotels and skyscrapers on.
      class  RailroadTrackSquare
      This class is provided to meet the needs of the railroads.
      class  utilitySquare
      Utility Squares, as data types, have different arrival procedures than any other buyable properties.
